title: TNURSB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 59 Inspector, Head Constable Posts
description: The Tamil Nadu Uniformed Services Recruitment Board (TNUSRB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 59Â Inspector, Head Constable, and Assistant Inspector Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass can apply for the TNURSB Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details...
